sentences.chinese: 以客吏初起，從入漢，以都尉擊項籍、代，侯，比彭侯，千戶。
sentences.literal: As guest official initially rose, followed entered Han, as commander attacked Xiang Yu, Dai, made marquis, comparable to Peng Hou, one thousand households.
sentences.idiomatic: As guest official, he initially rose up and followed into Han service. As commander, he attacked Xiang Yu and Dai, for which he was made a marquis comparable to Peng Hou with one thousand households.

sentences.literal: Third month Bing Xu day enfeoffed, third year died.
sentences.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Bing Xu day of the third month; died in the third year.

sentences.chinese: 十一年，戴侯章復嗣，二十九年薨。
sentences.literal: Eleventh year, Dai Marquis Zhang again succeeded, twenty-ninth year died.
sentences.idiomatic: In the eleventh year, Dai Marquis Zhang again succeeded to the marquisate; died in the twenty-ninth year.

sentences.chinese: 孝文三年，侯復嗣，二年，有罪，免。
sentences.literal: Xiaowen third year, Marquis Fu succeeded, second year, guilty, dismissed.
sentences.idiomatic: In Emperor Wen's third year, Marquis Fu succeeded to the marquisate; in the second year, he was guilty and dismissed.

sentences.chinese: 元康四年，驸曾孫長安大夫定詔復家。
sentences.literal: Yuankang fourth year, Pu's great-grandson Chang'an Dafu Ding commanded to restore the family.
sentences.idiomatic: In the fourth year of Yuankang, Pu's great-grandson, Chang'an Dafu Ding, was commanded to restore the family line.

sentences.chinese: 以卒從起薛，以弩將入漢，以都尉擊項羽、代，侯，千戶。
sentences.literal: As soldier followed uprising from Xue, as crossbow general entered Han, as commander attacked Xiang Yu, Dai, made marquis, one thousand households.
sentences.idiomatic: As a soldier, he followed the uprising from Xue. As crossbow general, he entered Han service. As commander, he attacked Xiang Yu and Dai, for which he was made a marquis with one thousand households.

sentences.chinese: 三月丙戌封，二十二年薨。
sentences.literal: Third month Bing Xu day enfeoffed, twenty-second year died.
sentences.idiomatic: Enfeoffed on the Bing Xu day of the third month; died in the twenty-second year.

sentences.chinese: 孝文三年，戴侯執嗣，二十三年薨。
sentences.literal: Xiaowen third year, Dai Marquis Zhi succeeded, twenty-third year died.
sentences.idiomatic: In Emperor Wen's third year, Dai Marquis Zhi succeeded to the marquisate; died in the twenty-third year.

sentences.chinese: 孝景三年，侯武嗣，十一年，後元年，有罪，免。
sentences.literal: Xiaojing third year, Marquis Wu succeeded, eleventh year, Hou first year, guilty, dismissed.
sentences.idiomatic: In Emperor Jing's third year, Marquis Wu succeeded to the marquisate; in the eleventh year, during the Hou first year, he was guilty and dismissed.

sentences.chinese: 元康四年，同玄孫費公士壽王詔復家。
